HotelElement.Name: Embassy Suites By Hilton Minneapolis Downtown Hotel

Description.Text: Set in central downtown Minneapolis, our Embassy Suites hotel is a quick walk to the Hennepin Theatre District and sports venues like Target Field, US Bank Stadium and Target Center. The hotel is also connected to the Skyway System , an enclosed footbridge path that weaves around downtown , for easy access to shops, restaurants, nightlife and attractions in Minneapolis. Looking for some fresh air? It's a short stroll to the Mississippi River waterfront to enjoy lush parks, hiking trails and the beautiful Saint Anthony Falls. Minneapolis also has yearly events like the Minnesota State Fair, Twin Cities Pride, and the Renaissance Festival.

Start your morning with free made-to-order breakfast, or pick up treats in our convenience shop. Join us any night at our complimentary Evening Reception,* and enjoy cocktails at the stylish lobby bar. Our Minneapolis hotel also has 24-hour room service and is connected to Lyon's Pub and Rock Bottom lounge.
